page.title: 13FECKENHAM NEWCOMERS
page.content: VILLAGE LIFE -A PUPIL I moved to Feckenham a year ago. I used to live in London. I like Feckenham better. My house is now a proper house but before we moved in it was an old barn.The sitting room used to be a pig sty. There is lots of wildlife in Feckenham. You see rabbits and foxes and there is a stream at the end of the garden. I go to school at Feckenham First School, it is a long walk, so sometimes we go in the car. My older sister has to catch the coach every day to go to the Middle School. There is only one shop in the village and it is also the Post Office. On Sundays we go to Sunday School. We go and play on the playing fields down the road from my house. The road is busy and I am not allowed to go across it.
